fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Kafka Streaming Workflow


This workflow reads in events from the Kafka topic 'bike_sharing'

  • Calculates the number of bikes rented on an hourly basis.
  • Displays the results on a Graph


Start Kafka and create Topic 'bike-sharing'


  • â€‹The quick start guide of Kafka is at : https://kafka.apache.org/quickstart
  • Create the topic 'bike-sharing' in Kafka
  • kafka-topics.sh --create --zookeeper localhost:2181 --replication-factor 1 --partitions 1 --topic bike-sharing


Send the data file 'bike_sharing_noheader.csv' to the Kafka Topic 'bike-sharing'


  • bike_sharing_noheader.csv is in the data directory of the Fire Install
  • cat bike_sharing_noheader.csv | kafka-console-producer.sh --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic bike-sharing (assuming the Kafka broker is running at localhost:9092)


Run the workflows on the Spark Cluster


  • This would start a spark streaming job on the Spark Cluster
  • You can keep pushing the data file to the Kafka topic for processing
